header.title: Java Engineer | Distributed Systems | High Concurrency | International Payments

resume.summary: Highly motivated **Java Engineer** with 4+ years of experience in **software development and architecture**, specializing in **distributed systems** and **high-concurrency** environments. Proven ability to design and code for **international payment systems**, tackling **massive data processing** and complex business models. Adept at ensuring **high stability**, **quality**, and performance, with strong **system design capabilities** and a commitment to **good coding practices**.

skills.items: Java, Python, Go, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL, C++
Microservices, Event-Driven, REST APIs, RPC, Asynchronous Processing
MySQL, Redis, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, SQL Optimization, Message Queues
AWS (Lambda, SQS, API Gateway), Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD, Terraform
Spring Boot, Micronaut, Django, Flask, Node.js, Express.js
System Design, High-Availability, OOP, SOLID, Design Patterns, Code Review
Git, Agile, Performance Tuning, Online Debugging, Problem-Solving

bullets: **Architected & coded** event-driven pipelines for **international payment systems**, processing **7.5M+ XML compliance records** across 180+ countries.
Engineered **high-concurrency microservices** with **multi-queue priority routing**, achieving **40 records/second** and **99.9% data integrity**.
Optimized **AWS Lambda-based APIs** and implemented **batch processing**, reducing request latency by **40%** and improving turnaround by **35%**.
Enhanced system **security by 50%** through AWS WAF, IAM, and TLS integration, ensuring **zero-downtime migrations** and 99.9% uptime.
Mentored 5 junior engineers and collaborated with 7 cross-functional teams, fostering **good coding practices** and **code review** culture.
Developed **high-throughput Python data processing pipelines**, improving system throughput **3x** through **concurrent execution**.
Designed **microservices integration patterns** and **API orchestration**, reducing manual interventions by **50%** via automation.
Optimized **database query performance** and ETL pipeline efficiency, reducing data processing latency by **35%**.
Implemented robust **monitoring, scheduling, and error-handling frameworks**, improving data extraction accuracy by **20%**.

projects.title: Calendly (Enterprise Calendar Management)
projects.tech: Java 11, Maven, JUnit, Design Patterns, MVC
projects.bullet1: Engineered an **enterprise-grade Java calendar application** demonstrating **6+ design patterns** and **SOLID principles** for robust architecture.
projects.bullet2: Achieved **98% line coverage** and **95% mutation coverage** through comprehensive JUnit testing, ensuring **high stability** and quality.

projects.title: Orion Platform (Kubernetes Operator PaaS)
projects.tech: Go, Kubernetes, Operator SDK, Docker, CRDs
projects.bullet1: Developed a **cloud-native Kubernetes Operator in Go** for **single-command application deployment**, enabling environment-aware provisioning.
projects.bullet2: Implemented **event-driven reconciliation** and automated service setup (PostgreSQL, Redis, MinIO), ensuring **sub-second sync time** and scalability.

projects.title: Port Management System (Maritime Logistics Platform)
projects.tech: Django, MySQL, Python, Advanced SQL, Stored Procedures
projects.bullet1: Designed a **database-driven maritime logistics platform** with **50+ stored procedures** and **Dijkstra's algorithm** for optimal pathfinding.
projects.bullet2: Managed **15+ interconnected tables** and **1000+ concurrent calculations** with **sub-second response times**, demonstrating **high stability** and performance.
